original: Bodhasūtra
analyzed: bodhasūtra

original: Hart_1 “pṛccha Bodha d eva yad yad evākāṁkṣasi.”
analyzed: hart pṛccha bodha d eva yat yat eva akākṣasi

original: Hart_2 “katibhir bhadaṁtāṁgaiḥ samanvāgata āryaśrāvakaḥ kṣipram evāsmiṁ dharmavinaye āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti?”
analyzed: katibhiḥ bhadatāgaiḥ samanvāgataḥ ārya śrāvakaḥ kṣipram eva asmi dharma vinaye āsrava kṣayam anuprāpnoti

original: Hart_3 “tena hi Bodha tvām eva pra + + yathā te kṣamate ’thainam vyākuru! kiṁ manyase Bodha
analyzed: hart tena hi bodha tvām eva pra yathā te kṣamate thā enam vyākuru ki manyase bodha

original: kuśalas tvaṁ pitrye śilpasthānakarmasthāne tadyathāhastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe
analyzed: kuśalaḥ tva pitrye śilpasthāna karmasthāne tat yathā hasti grīvāyām aśva pṛṣṭhe rathe

original: sarau dhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṁkuśagrahepāśagrahe toramaragrahe lipigaṇananyasanasaṁkhyāmudrāyāṁ?”
analyzed: sarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe akuśa grahe pāśa grahe toḥ amara grahe lipi gaṇana nyasana sakhyā mudrāyā

original: Hart_4 “tathyam ahaṁ bhadanta kuśalaḥ pitrye śilpasthānakarmasthāne tadyathāhasti-grīvāyām
analyzed: hart tathyam aha bhadanta kuśalaḥ pitrye śilpasthāna karmasthāne tat yathā hastigrīvāyām

original: aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe sarau dhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṁkuśagrahetomaragrahe lipigaṇananyasanasaṁkhyāmudrāyām.”
analyzed: aśva pṛṣṭhe rathe sarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe a kuśa grahe tomara grahe lipi gaṇana nyasana sakhyā mudrāyām

original: Hart_5 “atha puruṣa āgacchet tasyaivaṁ syāt: kuśalo bata Bodho rājakumāraḥ pitryeśilpasthānakarmasthāne
analyzed: atha puruṣaḥ āgacchet tasya eva syāt kuśalaḥ bata bodhaḥ rāja kumāraḥ pitrye śilpasthāna karmasthāne

original: tadyathāhastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe saraudhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṁkuśagrahe pāśagrahe
analyzed: tat yathā a hasti grīvāyām aśva pṛṣṭhe rathe sa raudhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe a kuśa grahe pāśa grahe

original: tomaragrahe lipigaṇananyasanasaṁkhyāmudrāyāṁ. yanv aham asyāntikād anyatamānyatamaśilpasthānakarmasthānam anvāgamayeyam iti
analyzed: tomara grahe lipi gaṇana nyasana sakhyā mudrāyāḥ yanu aham asya antikāt anyatama anyatama śilpasthāna karmasthānam anvāgamayeyam iti

original: Hart_6 sa ca syād aśrāddhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tac chrāddhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt saḥ?”
analyzed: sa ca syāt aśrāddhaḥ ki manyase bodha yat tat śrāddhena saḥ

original: “no bhadaṁta.”
analyzed: naḥ bhadata

original: Hart_7 “sa ca syāc chaṭhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tadṛ śaṭhīna prāptavyanprāpnuyāt sa?”
analyzed: sa ca syāt śaṭhaḥ ki manyase bodha yat śaṭhīna prāptavyan prāpnuyāt sa

original: “no bhadanta.”
analyzed: no bhadanta

original: Hart_8 “sa ca syād bahvābādhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tad alpābādhena prāptavyaṁ prāpnuyāt saḥ?”
analyzed: sa ca syāt bahu ābādhaḥ ki manyase bodha yat tat alpa ābādhena prāptavya prāpnuyāt saḥ

original: “no bhadanta.”
analyzed: no bhadanta

original: Hart_9 “sa ca syād anārabdhavīryaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tad ārabdhavīryeṇaprāptavyaṁ prāpnuyāt sa?”
analyzed: sa ca syāt anārabdha vīryaḥ ki manyase bodha yat tat prāpnuyāt sa

original: “no bhadanta.”
analyzed: no bhadanta

original: Hart_10 “sa ca syād duṣprajñaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tat prājñena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt sa?”
analyzed: sa ca syāt duṣprajñaḥ ki manyase bodha yat tat prājñena prāptavya prāpnuyāt sa

original: “no bhadanta; ekaikena tāvad bhadanta ito ’ṅgena samanvāgatena tena puruṣeṇa na sukaraṁ
analyzed: no bhadanta ekaikena tāvat bhadanta itas ṅgena samanvāgatena tena puruṣeṇa na

original: mamāntikād anyatamānyatamaṁ śilpasthāna-karmasthānam anvāgamayituṁ; kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvaiḥ.”
analyzed: mama antikāt anyatama anyatama śilpasthāna karmasthānam anvāgamayitu kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvaiḥ

original: Hart_11 “dvitīyo .āpuruṣa āgacchet tasyaivaṁ syāt: kuśalo bata Bodho rāja-kumāraḥ pitrye
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ āpuruṣaḥ āgacchet tasya eva syāt kuśalaḥ bata bodhaḥ rāja kumāraḥ pitrye

original: śilpasthānakarmmasthāne tadyathāhastigrīvāyāṁ aśva-pṛṣṭhe rathe sarau dhanuṣy apayāne
analyzed: śilpasthāna karmmasthāne tat yathā hasti grīvāyāḥ aśva pṛṣṭhe rathe sarau dhanuṣi apayāne

original: niryāṇe aṁkuśagrahe pāśagrahe tomaragrahelipigaṇananyasanaṁsaṁkhyāmudrāyāṁ. yanv
analyzed: niryāṇe a kuśa grahe pāśa grahe tomara grahe lipi gaṇana nyasana sakhyā mudrāyāḥ

original: aham asyāntikād anyata-mānyatamac chilpasthānakarmmasthānam anvāgamayeyam iti.
analyzed: aham asya antikāt anyatama anyatamat śilpasthāna karmmasthānam anvāgamayeyam iti

original: Hart_12 sa ca syāc chrāddhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha yat tac chrāddhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt sa?”
analyzed: sa ca syāt śrāddhaḥ ki manyase bodha yat tat śrāddhena sa

original: “evaṁ bhadanta.”
analyzed: eva bhadanta

original: Hart_13 “sa ca syād aśaṭhaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha:  yat tad aśaṭhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt sa?”
analyzed: sa ca syāt a śaṭhaḥ ki manyase bodha yat tat a śaṭhena sa

original: “evaṁ bhadanta.”
analyzed: eva bhadanta

original: Hart_14 “sa ca syād alpābādhaḥ; kim manyase Bodha: yat tad alpābādhena prāptavyaṁprāpnuyāt saḥ?”
analyzed: sa ca syāt alpa ābādhaḥ kim manyase bodha yat tat alpa ābādhena saḥ

original: “evaṁ bhadanta.”
analyzed: eva bhadanta

original: Hart_15 “sa ca syād ārabdhavīryaḥ; kiṁ manyase  Bodha: yat tad ārabdhavīryeṇaprāptavyaṁ prāpnuyāt sa?” “evaṁ bhadanta.”
analyzed: sa ca syāt ārabdhavīryaḥ ki manyase bodha yat tat prāpnuyāt saḥ eva bhadanta

original: Hart_16 “sa ca syāt prājñaḥ; kiṁ manyase Bodha: yat tat prājñena prāptavyaṁ prāpnuyātsa?”
analyzed: sa ca syāt prājñaḥ ki manyase bodha yat tat prājñena prāptavya prāpnuyāt sa

original: “evaṁ bhadanta; ekaikena tāvad bhadanta ito ’ṅgena samanvāgatena tenapuruṣeṇa sukaraṁ
analyzed: eva bhadanta ekaikena tāvat bhadanta itas ṅgena samanvāgatena tena puruṣeṇa sukara

original: mamāntikād anyatamānyatamac chilpasthānakarmasthānasamanvāgamayituṁ; kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvair.”
analyzed: mama antikāt anyatama anyatamat śilpasthāna karmasthāna samanvāgamayitu kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvaiḥ

original: Hart_17 “evam eva Bodha paṁcabhiḥ prādhānikāṁgais samanvāgata āryaśrāvakaḥkṣipram evāsmiṁ dharmavinaye āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti; katamaiḥ paṁcabhir?
analyzed: evam eva bodha pacabhiḥ prādhānika āgaiḥ samanvāgataḥ ārya śrāvakaḥ kṣipram eva asmi dharma vinaye āsrava kṣayam anuprāpnoti katamaiḥ pacabhiḥ

original: Hart_18.1 iha Bodha āryaśrāvakasya tathāgatasyāntike śraddhābhiniviṣṭābhavatimū lajātāpratiṣṭhitāasaṁhāryāśramaṇena
analyzed: iha bodhaḥ ārya śrāvakasya tathāgatasya antike śraddhā abhiniviṣṭā bhavati mū la jātā a pratiṣṭhitā a sahāryā śramaṇena

original: vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke sahadharmatam;
analyzed: vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke sahadharmatam

original: anena prathamenaprādhānikenāṁgena samanvāgato bhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
analyzed: anena prathamena prādhānikena āgena samanvāgataḥ bhavati ārya śrāvakaḥ

original: Hart_18.2 punar aparaṁ + Bodha āryaśrāvako ’śaṭhībhavaty amāyāvīṛjukoṛjukajātīyaḥ sa yathābhū
analyzed: punar aparaḥ bodhaḥ ārya śrāvakaḥ śaṭhībhavati a māyāvī iṛjuka uṛjuka jātīyaḥ sa yathābhūtam

original: tam ātmānam āviṣkaroti śāstur antike vijñānāṁ casabrahmacārīṇām anena dvitīyena prādhānikenāṁgena
analyzed: tam ātmānam āviṣkaroti śāstuḥ antike vijñānā ca sabrahmacārīṇām anena dvitīyena prādhānikena āgena

original: samanvāgatobhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
analyzed: samanvāgataḥ bhavati ārya śrāvakaḥ

original: Hart_18.3 punar aparaṁ āryaśrāvaka alpābādho bhavaty arogajātīyaḥ samayāpācanyāgrahaṇyāsamanvāgato
analyzed: punar aparaḥ ārya śrāvaka alpa ābādhaḥ bhavati aroga jātīyaḥ

original: nātyuṣṇayā nātiśītayāavyābādhayāṛtusukhāyāyayāpy aśitapītakhaditāsvāditāni samyaksukhena
analyzed: na ati uṣṇayā na ati śītayā a vyābādhayā ṛtu sukhāyāyayā api aśita pīta khadita āsvāditāni samyak sukhena

original: paripākaṁ gacchanti; anenatṛtīyena prādhānikāṁgena samanvāgato bhavaty ābhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
analyzed: gacchanti anena tṛtīyena prādhānika āgena samanvāgataḥ bhavati ābhavati ārya śrāvakaḥ

original: Hart_18.4 punar aparaṁ Bodha āryaśrāvakaḥ ārabdhavīryo viharati sthāmavāṁ vīryavānutsāhīdṛḍhaparākramo
analyzed: punar bodhaḥ ārya śrāvakaḥ ārabdha vīryaḥ viharati sthāmavān vīryavān utsāhī dṛḍha parākramaḥ

original: ’nikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu: kāmaṁ tvak snāyvasthi cāvatiṣṭhatāṁ, pariśuṣyatu
analyzed: nikṣipta dhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu kāma tvac snāyu asthi ca avatiṣṭhatā pariśuṣyatu

original: śarīrān māṁsaśoṇitam. atha ca punar yattad ārabdhavīryeṇa prāptavyaṁ sthāmavatā vīryavatā
analyzed: śarīrāt māsa śoṇitam atha ca punar yat tat ārabdha vīryeṇa sthāmavatā vīryavatā

original: utsāhinā dṛḍhaparākrameṇānikṣiptadhureṇa kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tad vata nāprāpyāntarādvīryasya
analyzed: utsāhinā dṛḍha parākrameṇa a nikṣipta dhureṇa kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tat vata na a prāpya antarāt vīryasya

original: sraṁsanaṁ bhaviṣyaty; anena caturthena prādhānikenāṁgena samana-vāgato bhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
analyzed: srasana bhaviṣyati anena caturthena prādhānikena āgena samanavāgataḥ bhavati ārya śrāvakaḥ

original: Hart_18.5 punar aparaṁ Bodhāryaśrāvakaḥ prajñāvān viharati lokasyodayāstaṁgaminyāprajñayāsamanvāgataḥ
analyzed: punar bodha ārya śrāvakaḥ prajñāvān viharati lokasya udaya asta gaminyā a prajñayā a samanvāgataḥ

original: āryayānairyāṇikayānairvedhikayāniryātitatkaraḥ sya hetoḥ samyagduḥkhakṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai;
analyzed: ārya yā nairyāṇika yā nairvedhika yā niryāti tad karaḥ sya hetoḥ samyak duḥkha kṣayāya duḥkhasya anta kriyāyai

original: anena paṁcamena prādhānikenāṁgena samanvāgato bhavaty āryaśrāvakaḥ.
analyzed: anena pacamena prādhānikena āgena samanvāgataḥ bhavati ārya śrāvakaḥ

original: Hart_19 ebhir Bodha paṁcabhiḥ prādhānikāṁgais samanvāgataḥ āryaśrāvakaḥ kṣipramevāsmiṁ dharmavinaye āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti.”
analyzed: ebhiḥ bodha pacabhiḥ samanvāgataḥ ārya śrāvakaḥ kṣipram eva asmi dharma vinaye āsrava kṣayam anuprāpnoti

original: Hart_20 atha Bodho rājakumāraḥ pū rvaṁ kāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṁ bāhumabhiprasāryāttamanāttamanāudānam
analyzed: atha bodhaḥ rāja kumāraḥ pu rva kāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇa bāhum abhiprasārya āttamana āttamana udānam

original: udānayati: “aho buddha aho dharma ahosaṁgha aho dharmasya svākhyātatā, yatredānīṁ
analyzed: udānayati aho buddha aho dharma ahosagha aho dharmasya su ākhyāta tā yatra idānī

original: paṁcabhiḥ prādhāni-kāṁgenagaiḥ samanvāgata āryaśrāvakaḥ kṣipram evāsmiṁ dharmavinayeāsravakṣayam anuprāpnotīti!”
analyzed: pacabhiḥ prādhānika āgenagaiḥ samanvāgataḥ ārya śrāvakaḥ kṣipram eva asmi dharma vinaye āsrava kṣayam anuprāpnoti iti
